text: Ovidiu Horșia (born 30 October 2000) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Liga I side Gaz Metan Mediaș, on loan from FCSB. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Statistics accurate as of match played . {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="3"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Academica Clinceni (loan) |2018–19 |28||5||1||0||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||29||5 |- ||Politehnica Iași (loan) |2019–20 |34||5||5||2||colspan="2"|–||colspan="2"|–||39||7 |- |Gaz Metan Mediaș (loan) |2020–21 |0 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |– | colspan="2" |– |0 |0 |- |Steaua Bucuresti |2020–21 |1 |0 |0 |0 |1 |0 |0 |0 |2 |0 |- ! colspan="2" |Career total !63!!10!!6!!2!!1!!0!!0!!0!!70!!12 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Târgu Mureș Category:Romanian footballers Category:Romania youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Steaua București players Category:FC Steaua II București players Category:FC Academica Clinceni players Category:FC Politehnica Iași (2010) players Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș players
title: Ovidiu Horșia
